titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize certain disabled former prisoners of war to use Department of Defense commissary stores and post and base exchanges.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Department of Defense.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the use of Department of Defense commissary stores and post exchanges for former prisoners of war who have been honorably separated from service and have a service-connected disability rating of 30 percent or more.
